title: MSF Appreciation Thread
body: Regardless of what happens in this series, we can all congratulate MSF on an amazing worlds run so far :)

replies.body: Well, didn't eliminate SKT, but this was an amazing series.  This is not a defeat.  This was their victory.  They didn't need to win.  They pushed SKT despite having such low chances of winning.  They were fun to watch, and they deserve to walk out feeling proud.
It seems the loser here is you.  MSF should have nothing but pride after that series.
Someone's a sour grape
More like a toddler
But people actually find sour grapes tasteful.
lol tf is wrong with you, dude???

TF is wrong with you all?  Stop celebrating mediocrity.  It was definitely a very good series, but I guarantee they are not going home feeling good.  They lost, that's never a good feeling.  If you easily accept your defeat, especially with this level of competition, you will never be the best.
They 100% did go home disappointed? That's incredibly obvious... That doesn't change the fact that even Huni admitted that that was the most difficult series of his career to win..
Expectations weren't that high for this team. Only loser here is you go uninstall salty troll

I think this is the furthest SKT has ever been pushed in the knockout stage of any Worlds. Even in their finals against SSG last year, they had 2 dominant victories (and the wins from SSG weren't as clean as those of MSF). Considering MSF is new to the LCS, that is a massive feat. 
They can be incredibly proud of what they have accomplished, and I can't wait to see them back next year.
And? They won. Robots always win. The game is retarded. One smite and win the game. It's who's the biggest robot

Your salt levels are through the roof O_O

And SKT are just mechanically the best, they got everything between coordination to champ knowledge to personal skills, that is why they are the champions three years in a row. 


MSF pulling out highly unusual picks and taking everyone by surprise to the point of pushing SKT and winning not one but two games? You really can't see why this is a highly interesting thing? Something that MSF should be proud of?

Altho to be fair it's was to be expected that by the next game after losing one that SKT had adapted and had a response to many of the important part of MSF's strategies while MSF weren't ready for that at all. And after they were slowly forced into playing at SKT's pace however MSF still nearly won the last game.

It was only a tiny little step away for MSF to won their way into semi's, over SKT, it was incredibly close. 


That is still an amazing feat on MSF's part, in essence what they did was to cheese  wins against SKT which is incredible, they didn't follow many of the common strategies and instead just did what they liked and they actually won games like that against the best team in all of league.


If you cant see why this is such a thing in this game where everyone constantly goes on about meta then you need to try and expand your horizons but i shall spell it out for you.


What MSF did was something that no one had considered possible, they nearly completely ignored the meta to roll over SKT and forced the 3 years in a row champion team into a corner just like that.

I don't think any other team could have done the same.
He’s just a troll, ignore him
lul hardstuck low silver with 900 matches , if you cant win this retarded game then you must be very smart

Why do you think he's so salty? I would be too if I was hardstuck 900 games at low silver. Can't comprehend that he's bad so blames the developer and the game. Makes sorry excuses like "I play for fun not to climb" when both are easily attainable if he wasn't such hot garbage
I'm hardstuck silver too lol, but I'm not salty. #NotAllHardstuckSilverPlayers

It's not just a 3-2, which no one really expected. It were 4 games where Misfits were really dominant. Yes, SKT came out as the better team due to their lategame comebacks, but honestly, the gap is really close and it was REALLY close from being a 3-1 OR 3-2 in favour of MSF. The only game where SKT shined was where Galio was for some reason not banned. That 80% winrate Galio was the only reason SKT could stomp that first game. Every pick from MSF got countered by a convenient R button.

Game 4, if that towerdive at the mid inhib went right or didn't happen, MSF would probably win.
Game 5, if they were slightly less hesistant on a Baron call or got a better pick after they baited them in or if they won the 50/50 elder drake smite they would've probably won.

But the same goes for EDG's games vs SKT. At this point, SKT is either very lucky, or has some sort of in-built tryndamere ult on their base.

Either way, this is even WAY more impressive than G2 taking a single game from SKT (and getting stomped in the other 3) in the MSI finals. I feel like the walls around Korean Kingdom are starting to fall apart, but they're still there. They're still in control of their kingdom. It's a time where everything's possible now which makes this worlds way more exciting than 2015 and 2016.

When Misfits secured second seed in Europe, I was dissapointed because I didn't think they were a match for the other top teams. It would be like last year where Splyce was a non-factor. This feeling was confirmed when MSF got crushed in their first game vs WE who then got crushed by TSM. But then the miracles happened and they kept happening so much that they were no miracles anymore but facts. Even when they got out of group stage, I thought they were just lucky, stealing enough games because they were underestimated. But this wasn't an underdog performance against SKT. Although they dropped in the quarter finals, this was the best performance of an EU team so far.
There goes my worlds bracket D; I went MSF all the way
That was ballsy lol...of course I went LongZhu so what do I know..
At least I picked SSG > Longzhu. :P
Yep, fresh strategies and actual strategies.
As a {{champion:89}} main, seeing them pick leona and winning with a game with her against SKT was just magical.

Reply to bind yourself to this vow (as I did):
I hereby swear that in the extremely unlikely case of MSF winning worlds I shall buy every MSF skin. May this sacrifice help  MSF win
Is there still a chance they might win though? I am not familiar with the worlds format
Nah, they out :(
RIP feelings

Misfits definitely has my respect.  They took the series to a game five and showed they can play League of Legends with the best.  Without question, my favorite team from Europe this year!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Especially when you consider that this was their first year in even the EU LCS. I wouldn't be surprised if they do even better next year.
Made me a fan honestly the bans and picks, the style of play was a thriller all the way through!

I'm just conflicted because I wanted Misfits to win so bad but SKT beat them using Tahm

I'm both happy and sad. Great series though. GG WP to SKT proving they're still champs.

Win or lose, this is unprecedented.  A western team taking SKT to game 5?  I don't think anyone expected that.  This is already amazing.  I'm crossing my fingers and hoping they can pull back and find their groove again in this last game.  I'd love to see that upset.  It isn't about disliking SKT.  It is about liking Misfits more. : D  They deserve any praise they get from this.
I feel like Crying, they really played well and deserved the win :(

I just want to say that going this far trying to beat SKT is already its own accomplishment. By a western team.

This is something we don't see every year, and that is enough to deserve attention and recognition, even if they didn't make it.

I know, generic comment, but I like seeing "non meta" stuff work. Even the crowd *loves* "off meta" stuff.

I believe they earned more fans by losing it than if they won for some reason this team made it from challenger series to worlds , and manage to get a huge upset in their group were most ppl expected them to go 0-6 , and then put SKT to match point and the 2 last games were insanely close and intense , mostly that blank drake steal on the 5th game , they did few mistakes but today SKT did  mistakes too and they were beatable , maybe next year even if MSF becomes better , if SKT performs also incredibly well and at their top level then maybe even if MSF play better than today they'd lose to them , but today it was a matter of inches , thats why it is a bit heartbreaking if they got 3-0'd id just look forward for next year so they can go 3-2 , but they had a great shot this year , in the current meta but they break this meta to put ignar on his signature champs and still get an ardent in their comp , they played so well i want to see more series from them , having to wait one entire year for next worlds while not beeing sure they'll adapt to the next year meta well or anything kinda sucks tbh .
So sad they didnt win. SKT really figured out how to get an even game going through the drafts in the second half.
It was an intense Bo5 ;)
Fucking hell of a series. Was not expecting that out of them. They had some brilliant drafts and it nearly led them into the semi.

i folow msf since challenger series and even before for Hans Sama since i know him from domingo ( a french streamer )  as he was only 16, was really happy to see them at worlds and actually put them 2d of the group , cuz they got underestimated even in EU before smashing both UOL and FNC in EU LCS summer play offs and qualifying to worlds , so i  didnt underestimated them this time and put them above TSM ( might have been some EU fanboying too tbh ) but they performed better than expected they mixed their own playing style with the meta , they adapted so well , i didnt expect them to get 2 games of SKT but this makes me somehow even more sad since they actually had a shot to win today and this would put them in a decent position for at least making finals , for such a young team its huge ,  they have lot of potential but waiting another year for seeing them playing at worlds is far too long , just hope they wont be fuked up about some strange meta and not perform next year . When i saw the tears of the players man that was horrible , but understandable both game 4 and 5 were actually winnable was really close today , wp to MSF ( and i hope SKT will  play slightly better otherwise they wont win worlds this year and i dont want msf to be kocked out for nothing ) .

I appreciate the lack of ardent sensor the most

But honestly, they were far better than expected.

To think they were in challenger series a year ago, everyone can be proud of MSF. They have come so incredibly far in so little time.
Even if they lose this series, they are an incredible team. They bring their own meta to the game, which makes LoL a joy to watch.
Omg they were so close to winning game 4. Almost history in the making taking out skt.
they put up one hell of a fight. they earned my respect.
They were good i enjoyed their performance
Not only does misfits deserve a ton of praise, it gives me hope that someone else will be able to take SKT down. I don’t know if I can stand another year where SKT wins.
They are called "Höppelepöps" here in germany xD

Upset happens often but this one is in a whole new level... In the past 3 years at worlds, the Koreans only been kick out of the tournament by another Korean team. This is the best upset in LoL history if they win this.

They showed how terrible SKT is. Multiple time world champion barely survive. They won by a centimeter, and only through luck.

They will be eliminated with prejudiced in the next round, they will be bitch slapped.

Really sorry to see Misfits lose.

I'm REALLY sorry that the casters gotta slurp that SKT-pepperoni-stick more.
